sn9.12:3.1: 12. Majjhanhikasutta
sn9.12:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.12:4.2: Atha kho tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9.12:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā tassa bhikkhuno santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn9.12:5.1: “Ṭhite majjhanhike kāle,
sn9.12:5.2: sannisīvesu pakkhisu;
